title: Zikaron Active Learning - Extract patterns from learnings to refine contexts
description: Extend zikaron beyond passive retrieval to active learning. Analyze indexed learnings/conversations to extract patterns, then propose context refinements via farther-steps queue. Human reviews with `fsteps pending` and applies with `fsteps apply`. Creates feedback loop where successful patterns improve future Claude behavior.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Design pattern extraction approach - what patterns to look for in learnings (recurring fixes, common mistakes, successful techniques)
Create `zikaron analyze` command that scans indexed content for patterns
Pattern output as structured JSON with confidence scores
Create `zikaron suggest-context` command that queues context proposals to farther-steps.json
Integration with farther-steps: proposals appear in `fsteps pending`, applied via `fsteps apply`
Add story context to learnings during indexing (story ID, criteria, outcome)
Document the active learning workflow in skill or context
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: feat: MP-128 zikaron active learning

notes: Integrates with farther-steps system. Agreed split: Zikaron handles analysis + pattern detection + proposal output. Farther-steps handles preview/smart-merge/auto-apply. Current fsteps accepts any type - proposals show in `fsteps pending` immediately. See Obsidian: Ralph/Farther-Steps Zikaron Integration.md
